Text:
My upload spoed is bietjie stadig, so wees maar net geduldig asb. 
:)

The audio is about 0.1 seconds fast compared to the video, this can be corrected when using VLC player by pressing the K key twice (50ms audio delay per input). With other players I'm not sure how to remedy this.

luister baie dankie man, daar moet meer Afrikaanse dinge wees vir mense te aflaai hier soos flicks. hierdie lyk goed, ek sal probeer op my rekennaar om die delay reg te maak.

sterkte
